summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Blocks 4 and 5, Queen Anne 2nd Addition, being the alley between 7th Avenue West and 8th Avenue West, from West Howe Street to West McGraw Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8905 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
